product_name: Royal Robbins Kick Around Pants - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: It's Saturday, and the livin' is easy. Slip into women's Royal Robbins Kick Around Pants and kick back in comfort, thanks to soft cotton with a touch of stretchy spandex. Cotton/spandex canvas is durable and enzyme washed to make it really soft. Offers UPF 50+ sun protection any time of year. Rotated side seams give a slimming look. Hand pockets; back snap-flap pockets. Royal Robbins Kick Around Pants for women feature a boot cut. Closeout.
short_description: It's Saturday, and the livin' is easy. Slip into women's Royal Robbins Kick Around Pants and kick back in comfort, thanks to soft cotton with a touch of stretchy spandex.
